Posts.Content: Oh yes!!!   I remember that rash very well!   I wad prescribed so many different medications by my oncology team,  but nothing worked.   I finally went to a local dermatologist and he cured it in a week.  I am afraid I don't remember the prescription,  but try a dermatologist is you don't get any relief in a couple of days@
Posts.Title: Reaction to paclitaxel
